segments.text: My attention drifts to the children, and a smile tugs at my lips.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a boy, precariously balanced on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into an open cabinet, right for the cookie jar!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The jar is labeled 'COOKIE JAR' in clear letters, no hiding that intention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little body is stretched, and the stool looks so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if heâ€™ll actually manage to get a cookie without toppling over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl stands nearby, hand outstretched, clearly in on the plan.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expectant face is priceless; she knows exactly what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is pure, unadulterated childhood mischief unfolding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite a daring feat, considering the adult is just feet away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're working together, a tiny conspiracy of sweetness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Let's hope they don't get caught, or worse, fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene is almost comical in its quiet intensity.
segments.speaker: PAR
